sentences.pinyin: wǒ duì qù nǎ'er wú suǒ wèi。
sentences.translation: I don't care where to go.

sentences.simplifiedText: 我是因为你的冷漠，才学会无所谓。
sentences.traditionalText: 我是因為你的冷漠，才學會無所謂。
sentences.pinyin: wǒ shì yīn wèi nǐ de lěng mò, cái xué huì wú suǒ wèi。
sentences.translation: It is because of your indifference that I have learned to be indifferent.

sentences.pinyin: Tā duì nà jiàn shì wúsuǒwèi.
sentences.translation: He doesn't care about that matter.

sentences.simplifiedText: 对于他来说，得到或者失去这个机会，他都无所谓。
sentences.traditionalText: 對於他來說，得到或者失去這個機會，他都無所謂。
sentences.pinyin: Duìyú tā lái shuō, dédào huòzhě shīqù zhège jīhuì, tā dōu wúsuǒwèi.
sentences.translation: For him, whether he gets or loses this opportunity, he doesn't care.
